channel.title: How do I make commands to give experience?
channel.description: Can anybody explain to me how to create commands which will add a lvl/set ammount of experience to the different skills. Or if these alreas=dy exhist please list them. Thanks.

@xstrxpurez wrote:

yea first number is xp and 2nd number is the skill… and well…
0 is def
1 is att i think
2 is str or hp…
and so on…

item.title: How do I make commands to give experience?
item.dc:creator: @Cruiser Cruiser
item.description:
@Cruiser wrote:

Ok Im sounding like a major newb here but I am so oh well.
So Im not chinging the addSkillXP part just the first number to the ammount of xp and the second number is the skill I want it added to yeah? Where do I find the numbers to each skill? Could somebody please list them?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make commands to give experience?

item.title: How do I make commands to give experience?
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

all u need to do is go in client.java and search for ur commands and then copy and paste 1 of them above 1 of them and change the command from like ::stuff to ::master and then change the give item thing to addxp or sumthing like that and make it look like this.

addSkillXP(4000000, 1);

and so on… but the add xp thing might not be rite but ya it should be sumthing like that.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make commands to give experience?

item.title: How do I make commands to give experience?
item.dc:creator: @MoparUnited MoparUnited
item.description:
@MoparUnited wrote:

Here is the code you can add with your command addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
The (14000000) is the exp and the 0 is the player combat skill.

Read full topic
